author: hwright
msg: Reuse prepared sqlite statements, and other sql improvements in the FSFS rep
(fs_fs_data_t): Use the new struct instead of just a db reference.
(upgrade_sql): Make static, and remove the redundant index.
(svn_fs_fs__open_rep_cache): Change the reference to the database handle.
svn_fs_fs__inc_rep_reuse): Prepare sqlite statements if they haven't already

author: kameshj
msg: Merge r33641, r33644 from backport branch 1.5.x-r33641.
Bug in which merging a path containing spaces would fail.  Generally
URL-encode paths when appending them to URLs.
Justification: silly bug, easy fix; similar to previously-ported fixes.
There is a minor conflict with r33644 due to the whitespace cleanup
